title: Omoi Omoware Suri Surare
original_name: 想い想われスリスラレ
sinopse:
1. Omoi Omoware Suri Surare (Thinking Thoughts, Picking Pockets)
2. Tadaima Cohunai Junkaichuu!!
3. Yosoji Aika (An Elegy of his Forties)
4. Ah, Seishun no Iwakisou!! (Ah, Iwaki Villa of Youth!)
5. Yasai Ouji!! (Vegetable Prince!)
6. Gunyuu Kakkyo de Ii ja Nai! (Rivaling Warlords Are Better, Right?)
